name: Mirror Lake (Pedatte)
description:
Mirror Lake was made in 48 hours for the Arte 2023 Game Jam

The game

The fallen leaves tell a story

The great tower was shattered

In our home, across the fog, the Lake between

Now, Your fallen soul is nowhere to be found.

Gather the fallen piece of Tower

To stand before the Lake Tower

And become the Tower Lord

Controls- Top character
  • Left Joystick (Q/D) : Move
  • Left trigger (Shift) while moving : Dash
  • Left Bumper (Z or W) : Jump
- Bottom character
  • Right Joystick (Left/Right Arrows) : Move
  • Right trigger (Pav Num 0) while moving : Dash
  • Right Bumper (Up Arrow): Jump
Team:

3D Artist - Animator - Tom Le Lann @vorunah

2D Artist - Emmanuel Dodet @dodet

Audio Artist - Ivan Duprat @GreatGaret

Programming - Kevin Pedatte @kpedatte
